images.title: SaaS Dashboard Hero
images.prompt: A premium SaaS dashboard interface floating on a deep blue-black gradient background (#050816 to #0A0F1E, 135-degree angle). The main dashboard is a large rounded-rectangle card (24px corner radius) with a semi-transparent dark surface (#1F2937 at 95% opacity) and subtle white border (8% opacity). Inside the card: a clean sidebar on the left with outlined icons (1.5px stroke, white), a header row with metric cards, and a central area with a smooth line chart trending upward. The line chart uses indigo (#6366F1) with a soft glow (20px blur, 40% opacity). Three smaller stat cards float beside the main dashboard, each with 16px corner radius, casting soft shadows downward-right. A subtle 32px grid pattern (1px white lines at 10% opacity) covers the background. Accent colors: indigo (#6366F1) for primary data, cyan (#22D3EE) for secondary highlights. Light source from top-left. Geometric sans-serif typography. No people, no logos, no text sentences.

style.lighting: Top-left soft key light, diffuse fill from bottom-right, indigo glow on focal elements
style.ui_fidelity: Production-quality UI mockup with realistic shadows and highlights
style.focal_point: Main dashboard card, positioned slightly left of center

images.title: Analytics Network Visualization
images.prompt: An abstract data visualization on a deep blue-black gradient background (#050816 to #0A0F1E, 135-degree angle). A network of 12-15 nodes connected by smooth bezier curves (1.5px stroke weight, cyan #22D3EE). Nodes are small rounded squares (8px radius) with soft indigo glow (20px blur, 40% opacity). Three central nodes are larger and brighter, representing key metrics, with concentric glow rings suggesting activity. Connection lines have gradient opacity (solid at source, fading to 30% at destination) showing data flow direction. A subtle 32px grid pattern (1px white lines at 10% opacity) in the background. Small floating labels near nodes use uppercase geometric sans-serif text (medium weight). Primary accent: indigo #6366F1. Secondary accent: cyan #22D3EE. All shadows fall down-right. No people, no logos.

style.lighting: Ambient glow from nodes, subtle top-left bias, no harsh shadows
style.focal_point: Central cluster of three bright nodes

images.title: Report Generation Interface
images.prompt: A floating report interface card on a deep blue-black gradient background (#050816 to #0A0F1E, 135-degree angle). The main card is white (#FFFFFF at 95% opacity) with 16px corner radius and soft shadow falling down-right (elevation level 3). Inside: a header bar with 'Report' label in bold geometric sans-serif, a mini bar chart using indigo (#6366F1) bars with subtle glow, a data table with alternating row backgrounds, and summary metric boxes at the bottom. Two smaller cards float nearby at different depths, showing related charts. All cards share identical 16px corner radius and shadow direction. Thin border on cards (1px, white at 8% opacity). A subtle 32px grid visible in background. Accent highlights in cyan (#22D3EE). Light source from top-left. No people, no logos, minimal text labels only.

style.lighting: Soft top-left key light, white cards appear to glow against dark background
style.color_temperature: Cool with warm white card surfaces

images.title: Integration Hub Diagram
images.prompt: A hub-and-spoke integration diagram on a deep blue-black gradient background (#050816 to #0A0F1E, 135-degree angle). In the center, a glowing rounded square (24px radius) representing the platform core, with indigo (#6366F1) fill and pulsing glow effect (concentric rings fading outward, 20px blur). Eight satellite nodes arranged in a circle around the hub, each a smaller rounded square (12px radius) with dark surface (#1F2937) and 1px white border (8% opacity). Smooth bezier curves (1.5px cyan #22D3EE strokes) connect hub to satellites, with gradient opacity showing flow direction. Each satellite has a simple outlined icon (1.5px stroke): database cylinder, cloud, envelope, chart bars, gear, bracket-code, lightning bolt, bell. Subtle 32px grid in background. All shadows down-right. No people, no logos.

style.lighting: Central glow radiating outward, subtle ambient from top-left

images.title: Workflow Automation Flow
images.prompt: A horizontal workflow diagram on a deep blue-black gradient background (#050816 to #0A0F1E, 135-degree angle). Five sequential nodes arranged left-to-right: trigger (lightning icon), filter (funnel icon), transform (arrows icon), action (gear icon), output (checkmark icon). Each node is a rounded square (16px radius) with dark surface (#1F2937), 1px white border (8% opacity), and contains a centered outlined icon (1.5px stroke, white). Smooth bezier curves (1.5px stroke) connect nodes sequentially, using cyan (#22D3EE) with gradient opacity showing flow direction left-to-right. The central 'transform' node has a subtle indigo glow (20px blur, #6366F1 at 40% opacity) indicating focus. Small uppercase labels below each node. Subtle 32px grid in background. All shadows fall down-right. No people, no logos.

style.lighting: Even ambient light, subtle glow on central node, top-left bias

images.title: Platform Architecture Overview
images.prompt: A three-column architecture diagram on a deep blue-black gradient background (#050816 to #0A0F1E, 135-degree angle). LEFT column: three stacked input nodes (API, webhook, file icons) as rounded squares (12px radius, dark #1F2937 surface). CENTER: a large processing engine card (24px radius) with indigo (#6366F1) border glow (20px blur, 40% opacity), containing small gear and filter icons inside. RIGHT column: three stacked output nodes (dashboard, download, bell icons). Smooth bezier curves (1.5px cyan #22D3EE stroke) flow from left nodes into center, then from center to right nodes, with gradient opacity showing direction. Column labels in uppercase geometric sans-serif: 'INPUT', 'PROCESS', 'OUTPUT'. Subtle 32px grid pattern. All elements cast soft shadows down-right. No people, no logos.

style.lighting: Central engine has primary glow, ambient top-left light

images.title: Growth Metrics Visualization
images.prompt: A dashboard card showing growth metrics on a deep blue-black gradient background (#050816 to #0A0F1E, 135-degree angle). Main card is dark surface (#1F2937) with 16px corner radius, 1px white border (8% opacity), soft shadow down-right. Inside: a smooth line chart with upward trend using indigo (#6366F1) stroke (2px weight) and subtle area fill (gradient to transparent). Five data points marked with glowing dots (8px, indigo with 20px glow blur). X-axis shows abbreviated month labels, Y-axis shows values. Below the chart, three small metric cards in a row, each with 12px radius, showing percentage values with cyan (#22D3EE) accent for positive indicators. Subtle 32px grid visible in card background. Geometric sans-serif typography. No people, no logos.

style.lighting: Soft top-left, chart line has subtle glow, data points emit light
style.focal_point: Line chart with glowing data points

images.title: Pricing Comparison Cards
images.prompt: Three pricing cards side-by-side on a deep blue-black gradient background (#050816 to #0A0F1E, 135-degree angle). All cards are white (#FFFFFF at 95% opacity) with 16px corner radius, casting soft shadows down-right. LEFT card (Starter): simple seed icon at top (outlined, 1.5px stroke, gray #6B7280), price below, subtle styling. CENTER card (Pro): slightly elevated with purple (#A855F7) glow border (20px blur, 30% opacity), star icon at top (outlined, 1.5px stroke, purple), 'POPULAR' tag in top corner. RIGHT card (Enterprise): building icon at top (outlined, gray), larger price. Cards spaced evenly with 32px gaps. Inside each card: icon, tier name in bold, price in large numerals, three feature bullets with small checkmarks. Geometric sans-serif typography throughout. No people, no logos.

style.lighting: Even top-left lighting, center card has accent glow
style.color_temperature: Cool with purple accent on featured tier

images.title: Before and After Transformation
images.prompt: Two interface cards side-by-side on a deep blue-black gradient background (#050816 to #0A0F1E, 135-degree angle). LEFT card labeled 'Before': dark surface (#1F2937), 16px radius, contains a chaotic arrangement of misaligned elements — scattered chart fragments, overlapping text blocks, inconsistent spacing, no clear hierarchy, desaturated gray tones. A subtle red-orange tint (#F59E0B at 10% opacity) overlay. RIGHT card labeled 'After': white surface (#FFFFFF at 95% opacity), 16px radius, contains the same information beautifully organized — aligned grid, clear hierarchy, proper spacing, clean chart, organized metrics. The 'After' card has a subtle indigo glow (20px blur, #6366F1 at 30% opacity). Labels above each card in uppercase geometric sans-serif. Arrow or transformation indicator between cards. Shadows fall down-right. No people, no logos.

style.lighting: Even ambient light, 'After' card has positive glow
style.color_temperature: Cool, with subtle warm warning on 'Before'

images.title: Developer API Experience
images.prompt: A code editor window floating on a deep blue-black gradient background (#050816 to #0A0F1E, 135-degree angle). The editor is a dark card (#111827) with 16px corner radius and soft shadow down-right. Window has three colored dots in top-left corner (red, yellow, green, small circles). Code inside uses syntax highlighting: keywords in purple (#A855F7), strings in cyan (#22D3EE), functions in indigo (#6366F1), comments in gray (#6B7280). Code shows a simple API call pattern with clean formatting. To the right of the editor, a smaller response preview panel (12px radius, dark #1F2937 surface) showing formatted JSON output with cyan (#22D3EE) keys. Three small floating icons around the scene: terminal bracket, document, gear — all outlined (1.5px stroke, white at 60% opacity). Subtle 32px grid in far background. Geometric monospace font for code. No people, no logos.

style.lighting: Subtle glow from code editor, ambient top-left light

images.title: Mobile Dashboard Experience
images.prompt: A smartphone mockup in portrait orientation on a deep blue-black gradient background (#050816 to #0A0F1E, 135-degree angle). Phone frame is dark (#1F2937) with 24px corner radius and soft shadow falling down-right. Screen shows a mobile dashboard: status bar at top, three metric cards in a row (12px radius each) with indigo (#6366F1) accent numbers, a mini line chart in the center with cyan (#22D3EE) line and subtle glow on data points, and three action buttons at bottom (rounded rectangles, 12px radius, indigo fill with white icons). The phone has a subtle outer glow (30px blur, indigo at 20% opacity) suggesting premium quality. Small floating notification badges near the phone (8px radius circles). UI uses geometric sans-serif typography. Consistent 8px spacing grid throughout interface. No people, no logos, no brand marks on phone.

style.lighting: Phone screen as light source, ambient top-left fill

images.title: Abstract Network Background
images.prompt: A subtle abstract background on a deep blue-black gradient (#050816 to #0A0F1E, 135-degree angle). A sparse network of thin connection lines (1px stroke, white at 15% opacity) with smooth bezier curves spanning the composition. Small node dots (4px diameter) at intersections, some with faint indigo glow (#6366F1 at 20% opacity, 20px blur). Three nodes slightly brighter than others, suggesting connection points. A subtle 32px grid pattern (1px white at 5% opacity) creates depth. Soft circular gradient overlays in the corners using muted indigo and cyan (at 10% opacity) add subtle color variation. Very low contrast overall — designed as a background that won't compete with overlaid text or testimonial cards. No UI elements, no icons, no text, no people, no logos.

style.lighting: Very subtle ambient glow from scattered nodes
style.focal_point: No single focal point — even distribution for background use
